author: CedarBK
title: Good for Harry Potter fans and people wanting to make customs
review: I really like this figure, I think that the arms are great for making custom figures in suits, if you have a minifigure in a suit with no arm printing. The torso is also really cool and detailed, I love the unique face and the dual moulded hair piece, and the sword is very very cool and super fun to use for a knight minifigure. As a Harry Potter fan I love this minifigure and really hope to put in a Gringots Bank some day.
